query:
CREATE TABLE `sessions` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`userId` int NOT NULL,
	`openId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
	`token` text NOT NULL,
	`loginMethod` varchar(64),
	`userAgent` varchar(512),
	`expiresAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`lastActiveAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	CONSTRAINT `sessions_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
	INDEX `idx_sessions_token` (`openId`),
	INDEX `idx_sessions_userId` (`userId`),
	INDEX `idx_sessions_expiresAt` (`expiresAt`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 1eAqNqce666eDxh.ea4f3b5bd2a0 --database ZcSpbTjo8yTZWfuGuozyuC --execute CREATE TABLE `sessions` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`userId` int NOT NULL,
	`openId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
	`token` text NOT NULL,
	`loginMethod` varchar(64),
	`userAgent` varchar(512),
	`expiresAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`lastActiveAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	CONSTRAINT `sessions_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
	INDEX `idx_sessions_token` (`openId`),
	INDEX `idx_sessions_userId` (`userId`),
	INDEX `idx_sessions_expiresAt` (`expiresAt`)
);
